Uses of Package
io.atomix.copycat.server.storage

  • Packages that use io.atomix.copycat.server.storage 
    Package Description
    io.atomix.copycat.server
    Raft server API.
    io.atomix.copycat.server.storage
    Provides a standalone segmented log for Copycat's Raft implementation.
    io.atomix.copycat.server.storage.cleaner
    Classes that support efficient Raft log cleaning.
  • Classes in io.atomix.copycat.server.storage used by io.atomix.copycat.server

    Immutable log configuration/factory.
